parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.56

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Eden Editor

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets the grid increment for the given transformation type.<br>
Transformation types:
* Rotation - "r"
* Translation - "t"
* Scale - "s"

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''set3DENGrid''' [type,value]
</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> type: [[String]] - name of transformation
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> value: [[Number]] - transformation increment
</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[set3DENGrid]] ["t",100];// 100m movement increment</code>

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value>
